description: Example request demonstrating income assets and mortgage extending past retirement

goals.name: Retirement Planning with Income and Mortgage

assets.name: Salary Income
assets.comments: Annual salary that stops at retirement

assets.name: KiwiSaver
assets.comments: KiwiSaver with employer and government contributions

liabilities.name: Home Mortgage
liabilities.comments: 25-year mortgage that extends 5 years past retirement

comments: 1. Income asset (salary) that stops at retirement age 65
2. Mortgage with payments continuing 5 years past retirement
3. KiwiSaver and investment portfolio for retirement savings
4. Safe Withdrawal Rate strategy with 4% rule
5. Monte Carlo simulation with 1000 runs for probabilistic outcomes
